price: Kuma ku asirta maganarku ko ku bayyana ta, lalle shi, (Allah), Masani ne ga abin da ke cikin ƙirãza.
arabic: وَأَسِرُّواْ قَوۡلَكُمۡ أَوِ ٱجۡهَرُواْ بِهِۦٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-asirrū qawlakum awi ij'harū bihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
